title: Herb Test - Siegel Pigeons
cleaned_text: Description A leading product for control of germs in the drinking water. Produced through a process of electrolysis, which produces hydrochloride, a powerful disinfectant yet well tolerated by the pigeon. $17.50 Herbovet Herb Test 1000ml Out of stock A leading product for control of germs in the drinking water.
